name: Content Uniqueness
description: Tests the model's ability to generate unique presentation content that stands out from standard approaches

prompts.text: Create a unique sales presentation for a standard office productivity software suite. The market is saturated with similar products, so your presentation needs to stand out with a distinctive approach, unusual value propositions, or unexpected positioning. Avoid clichés and standard sales presentation formats.
expected_elements: Fresh approach to a common product category

prompts.text: Create a presentation about team building with a unique visual concept. Instead of the usual corporate imagery and standard metaphors (puzzles, buildings, bridges), develop a completely fresh visual theme that will make this presentation memorable and distinctive. Describe the visual approach in detail.

cliché_avoidance.description: Avoidance of common clichés and tropes

memorability.description: Potential for the content to be memorable
